game.name: Peaceful Gunner
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Peace, love, and... GUNS! Peaceful Gunner is a shooter-defense game about good vibes. Shoot some magical flowers to turn soldiers into hippies and make the world a better place (or not).
